Trade/Device Name(s): FORA G30 Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FORA G30 Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing electrochemical detection for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from finger and alternative sites (palm, forearm, upper-arm, calf, thigh) by healthcare professionals and diabetics at home to aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes or for neonatal use.
